襴字的基本解释

襴
lán
见“襕”。

襴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lán］
［《集韻》郎干切，平寒，來。］
“襕1”的繁体字。亦作“襽1”。
(1)古代衣与裳相连的长衣下摆所加的作为下裳形制的横幅，称为襴。加襴之制，始于北周而定于唐。
(2)指襴衫。
(3)指襴袍。
(4)通“欄”。界阑。

襴字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　襴； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1127第17
【集韻】郞干切，音闌。【類篇】衣與裳連曰襴。【玉篇】衫也。【綱目集覽】馬周以三代布深衣，因于其下著襴及裾，名曰襴衫，以爲上士之服。　又與幱通。

襕
Basic explanation of words
襕
lán
See "襕".
襕
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lán］
["Ji Yun" Lang Ganqie, Ping Han, come. ]
"襕1" in traditional characters. Also known as "襽1".
(1) The hem of the long garment that was connected to the ancient garment was added as a banner in the shape of a lower garment, called a 襕. The system of adding 襕襕 began in the Northern Zhou Dynasty and decided in the Tang Dynasty.
(2) Refers to the sweater.
(3) Refers to the robe.
(4) Link the "column". Boundary.
襕
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　襕; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1127 Page 17
[Ji Yun] Yin dry cut, sound slanted. 【Classes】Clothes and garments are connected to each other. [Jade articles] Shirts too. [Compendium Collection] Ma Zhou used three generations of cloth and deep clothing. Because of the slings and slings under it, it was called the sergeant's clothes.　It is connected with each other again.
襕
